recent_episodes.description: If you’ve ever wondered how to get paid for the true value you bring to a company through campaigns they run year after year – and long after you write the initial copy → you need to hear from one of the GOATs, Kim Krause Schwalme. In this case-study-style episode, Kim lets us in on what went on behind the scenes as she grew from an in-house employee to a highly successful and sought-after copywriter in the industry, sitting in rooms with people like Jean Schwartz and other greats.
